textBox.richText: So last weekend, Alli had a bunch of Rugby folks up. The conditions were pretty evil though. Did a couple laps through Eagle Wind; pretty windblown. Went down to Pioneer, met up with Max’s class, just in time for the lift to be shut down due to wind. We hiked up, and got a snowmobile tow out. Dave & the rest of the ATP Devo crew kept going, even though only Arrow and Gemini were open...and eventually they opened Eskimo back up. This weekend, Max was sick saturday morning, so I went out solo. COLD day...mostly due to wind chill. Still made it from lifts open straight through to a little before 3. The annoying news: Phresheez didn’t track me last sunday, nor on the 3rd. Took a peek at it, and it says it’s having trouble storing the data. I’ll ping the guys over there and see what they say. Today was a Max day...much better weather. We did a bunch of laps through Eagle Wind (found the Mayor’s office!), Pioneer, and Jane-side bumps. Oh, and in case you didn’t notice from the picture above, Runaway (and the Chutes!) were open.
